body_html: Do you imply that you'll oppose .shape returning simple tuple because there is a downstream component that makes use of TensorShape data structure that has something other than what is contained in the tuple?
body_text: Do you imply that you'll oppose .shape returning simple tuple because there is a downstream component that makes use of TensorShape data structure that has something other than what is contained in the tuple?
body: Do you imply that you'll oppose `.shape` returning simple tuple because there is a downstream component that makes use of `TensorShape` data structure that has something other than what is contained in the tuple?
